attribs.name: saving_throws_notes
attribs.current: +1 Status to All Saves vs. Magic

attribs.name: repeating_interaction-abilities_-NBI9xW7cunOwlRP4Ka2_description
attribs.current: Alamair is in fact a Medium creature, but appears as a Large creature due to the force of her personality. A creature interacting with Alamair can attempt a DC 36 Will save to see the nikaramsa as they truly are. If the creature succeeds, the reach of Alamairs attacks against that foe decrease to 5 feet (10 feet for their tongue). If all creatures in Alamairs vicinity successfully disbelieve this illusion, the she becomes Medium and enfeebled 2 for as long as everyone sees her true form.

attribs.name: repeating_free-actions-reactions_-NBI9xW7cunOwlRP4Ka3_trigger
attribs.current: A Foe within 60 feet Casts Bless or a Beneficial Spell That Alamair Could Cast to Remove an Affliction or Condition (such as Neutralize Poison).

attribs.name: repeating_free-actions-reactions_-NBI9xW7cunOwlRP4Ka3_description
attribs.current: Effect: Alamair attempts to counteract the enemys spell (counteract modifier +24 and counteract level 7). If Alamair succeeds, the triggering creature is subjected to the effects of a bane spell or the effect it was trying to remove.

attribs.name: repeating_actions-activities_-NBI9xW7cunOwlRP4Ka7_description
attribs.current:
Alamair focuses her gaze on one creature within 60 feet. That target must attempt a DC 34 Will save. Regardless of the outcome of the saving throw, the target then becomes temporarily immune for 1 day. 
Critical Success: Alamair is caught off guard by the strength of the targets resistance and becomes stupefied 2 until the end of her next turn.  
Success: The target resists the Alamairs influence. 
Failure: The targets focus and willpower drain away; it becomes stupefied 2 for 1 minute. 
Critical Failure: As failure, but the target becomes stupefied 3 for 1 hour.

attribs.name: repeating_actions-activities_-NBI9xW7cunOwlRP4Ka8_description
attribs.current: DC 34, attack +26; 7th bane, bless, dimension door, divine decree (evil only), dream message, heal (3), illusory disguise (at will), invisibility (at will; self only), mind reading, neutralize poison, remove disease, remove curse, restore senses, ventriloquism (at will); 4th dimension door (at will); Constant (7th) detect alignment, magic aura (self only), nondetection (self only), see invisibility

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NBI9xW7cunOwlRP4Ka9_description
attribs.current: Alamair fills the minds of her enemies with doubt. Targets that fail their Will saves take a 1 status penalty to attack rolls as long as they are in the area. Once per turn, starting the turn after Alamair casts bane, she can use a single action, which has the concentrate trait, to increase the emanations radius by 5 feet and force enemies in the area that werent yet affected to attempt another saving throw. Bane can counteract bless.

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NBI9xW7cunOwlRP4KaA_description
attribs.current: Blessings from beyond help Alamair'S companions strike true. Alamair and her allies in the area gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls. Once per turn, starting the turn after Alamair casts bless, she can use a single action, which has the concentrate trait, to increase the emanation 's radius by 5 feet. Bless can counteract bane.

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NBI9xW7cunOwlRP4KaB_description
attribs.current: Opening a door that bypasses normal space, Alamair instantly transports herself and any items she's wearing and holding from her current space to a clear space within range she can see. If this would bring another creature with Alamaireven if she's carrying it in an extradimensional containerthe spell is lost.

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NBI9xW7cunOwlRP4KaC_description
attribs.current:
Evil Only
Alamair utters a potent litany from her faith, a mandate that harms those who oppose her ideals. Choose an alignment Alamair's deity has (evil). This spell gains the trait of the alignment Alamair chose. Alamair deals 7d10 damage to creatures in the area; each creature must attempt a Fortitude save. Creatures with an alignment that matches the one Alamair chose are unaffected by the spell. Those that neither match nor oppose it treat the result of their saving throw as one degree better and don't suffer effects other than damage.

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NBI9xW7cunOwlRP4KaD_description
attribs.current: Alamair sends a message to her target's dream. The message is one-way, up to 1 minute of speech (roughly 150 words). If the target is asleep, they receive the message instantly. If not, they receive it the next time they sleep. As soon as they receive it, the spell ends, and Alamair knows the message was sent.

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NBI9xW7cunOwlRP4KaE_description
attribs.current:
Alamair channels positive energy to heal the living or damage the undead. If the target is a willing living creature, Alamair restores 1d8 Hit Points. If the target is undead, Alamair deals that amount of positive damage to it, and it gets a basic Fortitude save. The number of actions Alamair spends when Casting this Spell determines its targets, range, area, and other parameters.
[one-action] (somatic) The spell has a range of touch.
[two-actions] (somatic, verbal) The spell has a range of 30 feet. If Alamair's healing a living creature, increase the Hit Points restored by 8.
[three-actions] (material, somatic, verbal) Alamair disperses positive energy in a 30-foot emanation. This targets all living and undead creatures in the burst.

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NBI9xW8rdNl3n25YhbT_description
attribs.current:
Alamair creates an illusion that causes her to appear as another creature of the same body shape, and with roughly similar height (within 6 inches) and weight (within 50 pounds), as herself. The disguise is typically good enough to hide Alamair's identity, but not to impersonate a specific individual. The spell doesn't change Alamair's voice, scent, or mannerisms. Alamair can change the appearance of her clothing and worn items, such as making your armour look like a dress. Held items are unaffected, and any worn item Alamair removes returns to its true appearance.
Casting illusory disguise counts as setting up a disguise for the Impersonate use of Deception; it ignores any circumstance penalties Alamair might take for disguising herself as a dissimilar creature, it gives you a +4 status bonus to Deception checks to prevent others from seeing through her disguise, and she adds her level even if she's untrained. Alamair can Dismiss this spell.

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NBI9xW8rdNl3n25YhbU_description
attribs.current: Cloaked in illusion, the Alamair becomes invisible. This makes Alamair undetected to all creatures, though the creatures can attempt to find her, making her hidden to them instead. If Alamair uses a hostile action, the spell ends after that hostile action is completed.

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NBI9xW8rdNl3n25YhbV_description
attribs.current: With a cursory mental touch, Alamair attempts to read the target's mind. It must attempt a Will save. The target then becomes temporarily immune to Alamair's mind reading for 1 hour.

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NBI9xW8rdNl3n25YhbW_description
attribs.current: Alamair pours healing magic through the target in an attempt to cure one poison afflicting it. Attempt a counteract check against the poison.

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NBI9xW8rdNl3n25YhbX_description
attribs.current: Healing magic purges disease from a creature's body. Alamair attempts to counteract one disease afflicting the target.

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NBI9xW8rdNl3n25YhbY_description
attribs.current: Alamair's touch grants a reprieve to a cursed creature. Alamair attempts to counteract one curse afflicting the target. If the curse comes from a cursed item or other external source, a success indicates that the target creature can rid itself of the cursed item, but it doesn't remove the curse from the item.

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NBI9xW8rdNl3n25YhbZ_description
attribs.current: Whenever Alamair speaks or makes any other sound vocally, she can make her vocalization seem to originate from somewhere else within 60 feet, and she can change that apparent location freely as she vocalizes. Any creature that hears the sound can attempt to disbelieve Alamair's illusion.

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NBI9xW8rdNl3n25Yhba_description
attribs.current: Opening a door that bypasses normal space, Alamair instantly transports herself and any items she's wearing and holding from her current space to a clear space within range she can see. If this would bring another creature with Alamaireven if she's carrying it in an extradimensional containerthe spell is lost.

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NBI9xW8rdNl3n25Yhbb_description
attribs.current:
Alamair eyes glow as you sense aligned auras. Choose chaotic, evil, good, or lawful. Alamair detects auras of that alignment. Alamair receives no information beyond presence or absence. Alamair can choose not to detect creatures or effects she's aware have that alignment.
Only creatures of 6th level or higherunless divine spellcasters, undead, or beings from the Outer Spherehave alignment auras.

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NBI9xW8rdNl3n25Yhbc_description
attribs.current:
Alamair alters the appearance of an item's magic aura. Alamair can choose to have the target's aura appear as that of common magic item of twice magic aura's level or lower, or to have it register as being under the effects of a spell of her choice of magic aura's level or lower. If the target is magical, Alamair can instead choose to have it appear as entirely non-magical.
A caster using detect magic or study aura of an equal or higher spell level can attempt to disbelieve the illusion from magic aura. Magic aura doesn't mask the aura of spells that are 9th level or higher or of items that are 19th level or higher.

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NBI9xW8rdNl3n25Yhbd_description
attribs.current: Alamair erects protective wards that make herself difficult to detect via magic. Nondetection attempts to counteract all detection, revelation, and scrying divinations made against the target or the target's gear throughout the duration, counting cantrips as 1st-level spells for this purpose. Successfully counteracting a divination that targets an area or multiple targets negates the effects only for nondetection's target.

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NBI9xW8rdNl3n25Yhbe_description
attribs.current: Alamair can see invisible creatures and objects. They appear to Alamair as translucent shapes, and they are concealed to her.

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NBI9xW7cunOwlRP4KaB_heightened
attribs.current: Heightened (5th) The range increases to 1 mile. Alamair doesn't need to be able to see her destination, as long as she has been there in the past and know its relative location and distance from her. Alamair is temporarily immune for 1 hour.

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NBI9xW7cunOwlRP4KaC_heightened
attribs.current: Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 1d10, and the level of creatures that must attempt a second save on a critical failure increases by 2.

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NBI9xW7cunOwlRP4KaC_save_failure
attribs.current: The creature takes full damage and is enfeebled 2 for 1 minute.

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NBI9xW7cunOwlRP4KaC_save_critical_failure
attribs.current: The creature takes double damage and is enfeebled 2 for 1 minute. On Alamair's home plane, a creature that critically fails is banished with the effect of a failed banishment save. A 10th-level creature or lower must attempt a Will save. On a failure, it's paralyzed for 1 minute; on a critical failure, it dies.

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NBI9xW7cunOwlRP4KaD_target
attribs.current: 1 Creature Alamair Knows by Name and Have Met in Person

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NBI9xW7cunOwlRP4KaD_heightened
attribs.current: Heightened (4th) Alamair can target up to 10 creatures she knows by name and have met in person. Alamair must send the same message to all of them; the spell ends for each creature individually.

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NBI9xW7cunOwlRP4KaE_target
attribs.current: 1 Willing Living Creature or 1 Undead Creature

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NBI9xW7cunOwlRP4KaE_heightened
attribs.current: Heightened (+1) The amount of healing or damage increases by 1d8, and the extra healing for the 2-action version increases by 8.

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NBI9xW8rdNl3n25YhbT_heightened
attribs.current:
Heightened (2nd) The spell also disguises Alamair's voice and scent, and it gains the auditory trait.
Heightened (3rd) Alamair can appear as any creature of the same size, even a specific individual. Alamair must have seen an individual to take on their appearance. The spell also disguises Alamair's voice and scent, and it gains the auditory trait.

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NBI9xW8rdNl3n25YhbU_heightened
attribs.current: Heightened (4th) The spell lasts 1 minute, but it doesn't end if Alamair uses a hostile action.

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NBI9xW8rdNl3n25YhbV_duration
attribs.current: 1 Round or Sustained Up to 1 Minute

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NBI9xW8rdNl3n25YhbV_save_failure
attribs.current: Alamair perceives vague surface thoughts from the target when she Cast the Spell, and she finds out whether its Intelligence modifier is higher than, equal to, or lower than hers.

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NBI9xW8rdNl3n25YhbV_save_success
attribs.current: Alamair finds out whether the target's Intelligence modifier is higher than, equal to, or lower than hers.

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NBI9xW8rdNl3n25YhbV_save_critical_failure
attribs.current: As failure, and for the duration of the spell, Alamair can Sustain the Spell to detect the target's surface thoughts again. The target doesn't receive any additional saves.

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NBI9xW8rdNl3n25YhbV_save_critical_success
attribs.current: The target perceives vague surface thoughts from Alamair when she Cast the Spell.

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NBI9xW8rdNl3n25YhbZ_heightened
attribs.current: Heightened (2nd) The spell's duration increases to 1 hour, and Alamair can also change the tone, quality, and other aspects of your voice. Before a creature can attempt to disbelieve Alamair's illusion, it must actively attempt a Perception check or otherwise use actions to interact with the sound.

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NBI9xW8rdNl3n25Yhba_heightened
attribs.current: Heightened (5th) The range increases to 1 mile. Alamair doesn't need to be able to see her destination, as long as she has been there in the past and know its relative location and distance from her. Alamair is temporarily immune for 1 hour.

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NBI9xW8rdNl3n25Yhbb_heightened
attribs.current:
Heightened (2nd) Alamair learn each aura's location and strength.
Alignment Aura
The strength of an alignment aura depends on the level of the creature, item, or spell. The auras of undead, clerics and other divine spellcasters with a patron deity, and creatures from the Outer Sphere are one step stronger than normal (faint instead of none, for example).
Creature or Item Level -- Spell or Effect Level -- Aura Strength
0-5 -- n/a -- None
6-10 -- 0-3 -- Faint
11-15 -- 4-7 -- Moderate
16-20 -- 8-9 -- Powerful
21+ -- 10 -- Overwhelming

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NBI9xW8rdNl3n25Yhbc_duration
attribs.current: Until the Next Time Alamair Makes Her Daily Preparations

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NBI9xW8rdNl3n25Yhbc_heightened
attribs.current: Heightened (3rd) Alamair can target a creature instead of an object. When Alamair does, she can either conceal the auras of all magic items it has or have that creature's aura appear as if it were under the effect of a spell she knows.

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NBI9xW8rdNl3n25Yhbe_heightened
attribs.current: Heightened (5th) The spell has a duration of 8 hours.

attribs.name: immunities
attribs.current: Death Effects, Disease, Paralyzed, Poison, Unconscious

attribs.name: repeating_actions-activities_-NBm3GSThnFMJmUJKghB_description
attribs.current:
Any living, non-elf creature hit by the profane ghouls attack must attempt a DC 29 Fortitude save. 
Critical Success The creature is unaffected.
Success The creature is slowed 1.
Failure The creature is paralyzed. It can attempt a new save at the end of each of its turns, and the DC cumulatively decreases by 1 on each such save.

attribs.name: repeating_actions-activities_-NBm3QmeMnW8lOXZfPo1_description
attribs.current: The ghoul whispers profane secrets of undeath. Living creatures within 10 feet of the ghoul take [[2d8]] (2d8) persistent mental damage. Those with ghoul fever must also succeed at a DC 29 Will save or have the disease advance one step. The profane ghoul cant use Profane Whispers again for 24 hours.

attribs.name: repeating_actions-activities_-NBm3eIAkZ-XZyku9GPh_description
attribs.current: The profane ghoul crawls on all fours, moving up to half its Speed. This movement doesnt trigger reactions.

attribs.name: repeating_actions-activities_-NBm5GXgi2ulnZwJVpAs_description
attribs.current: Requirements The Erinyes Company agent is suffering from persistent damage; Effect The agent makes a Strike. If it hits, it deals an additional [[1d6]] (1d6) points of persistent damage; the type of this extra damage is the same as the persistent damage from which theyre suffering. The agent can choose to instead have this persistent damage be lawful or evil damage. This counts as two attacks when calculating their multiple attack penalty.

attribs.name: repeating_melee-strikes_-NBIAzcNRcYrWiDCW3zK_weapon_traits
attribs.current: Agile, Finesse, Thrown 10 feet, Versatile S

attribs.name: repeating_ranged-strikes_-NBm6FyegEzEtJhpsYuZ_weapon_traits
attribs.current: Agile, Finesse, Thrown 10 feet, Versatile S

attribs.name: repeating_actions-activities_-NBm6MOZw1yqaphtec2v_description
attribs.current: DC 17, attack +9; 1st create water, heal (2), mending; Cantrips (1st) detect magic, disrupt undead, light, prestidigitation, read aura

attribs.name: repeating_spellfocus_-NBm6ZQMGi55JLZIISnj_heightened
attribs.current: Heightened (+1) The additional healing increases by 2 HP.

attribs.name: repeating_spellfocus_-NBm6ZQMGi55JLZIISnj_description
attribs.current:
An acolyte of Pharasma's words bless a creature with an enhanced connection to positive energy. When the target regains Hit Points from a healing spell, it regains 2 additional Hit Points.
The target regains additional Hit Points from healer's blessing only the first time it regains HP from a given healing spell, so a spell that heals the creature repeatedly over a duration would restore additional Hit Points only once.

attribs.name: repeating_cantrip_-NBm6ajWbhjjTstSdkVK_heightened
attribs.current:
Heightened (3rd) An acolyte of Pharasma learns the school of magic for the highest-level effect within range that the spell detects. If multiple effects are equally strong, the GM determines which the acolyte learns.
Heightened (4th) As 3rd level, but an acolyte of Pharasma also pinpoints the source of the highest-level magic. Like for an imprecise sense, the acolyte doesn't learn the exact location, but can narrow down the source to within a 5-foot cube (or the nearest if larger than that).

attribs.name: repeating_cantrip_-NBm6ajWbhjjTstSdkVK_description
attribs.current:
A acolyte of Pharasma sends out a pulse that registers the presence of magic. The acolyte receives no information beyond the presence or absence of magic. The acolyte can choose to ignore magic they're fully aware of, such as the magic items and ongoing spells of them and their allies.
You detect illusion magic only if that magic's effect has a lower level than the level of your detect magic spell. However, items that have an illusion aura but aren't deceptive in appearance (such as an invisibility potion) typically are detected normally.

attribs.name: repeating_cantrip_-NBm6cbx7vUTNAEHw98f_description
attribs.current: An acolyte of Pharasma lance the target with energy. The acolyte deals 1d6 positive damage plus their wisdom modifier. The target must attempt a basic Fortitude save. If the creature critically fails the save, it is also enfeebled 1 for 1 round.

attribs.name: repeating_cantrip_-NBm6cbx7vUTNAEHw98f_save_critical_failure
attribs.current: If the creature critically fails the save, it is also enfeebled 1 for 1 round.

attribs.name: repeating_cantrip_-NBm6eYiw8vuLn8zbeCX_target
attribs.current: 1 Object of 1 Bulk or Less, Either Unattended or Possessed by the Acolyte or a Willing Ally

attribs.name: repeating_cantrip_-NBm6eYiw8vuLn8zbeCX_duration
attribs.current: Until the Next Time the Acolyte Makes Their Daily Preparations

attribs.name: repeating_cantrip_-NBm6eYiw8vuLn8zbeCX_heightened
attribs.current: Heightened (4th) The object sheds bright light in a 60-foot radius (and dim light for the next 60 feet).

attribs.name: repeating_cantrip_-NBm6eYiw8vuLn8zbeCX_description
attribs.current: The object glows, casting bright light in a 20-foot radius (and dim light for the next 20 feet) like a torch. If an acolyte of Pharasma casts this spell again on a second object, the light spell on the first object ends.

attribs.name: repeating_cantrip_-NBm6faFpPccRyvjEvU2_description
attribs.current:
The simplest magic does an acolyte of Pharasma's bidding. The acolyte can perform simple magical effects for as long as they Sustain the Spell. Each time the acolyte Sustain the Spell, they can choose one of four options.
 Cook Cool, warm, or flavour 1 pound of nonliving material.
 Lift Slowly lift an unattended object of light Bulk or less 1 foot off the ground.
 Make Create a temporary object of negligible Bulk, made of congealed magical substance. The object looks crude and artificial and is extremely fragileit can't be used as a tool, weapon, or spell component.
 Tidy Colour, clean, or soil an object of light Bulk or less. The acolyte can affect an object of 1 Bulk with 10 rounds of concentration, and a larger object a 1 minute per Bulk.
Prestidigitation can't deal damage or cause adverse conditions. Any actual change to an object (beyond what is noted above) persists only as long as the acolyte Sustain the Spell.

attribs.name: repeating_cantrip_-NBm6gPRrafufvjm5RRu_heightened
attribs.current:
Heightened (3rd) An acolyte of Pharasma can target up to 10 objects.
Heightened (6th) An acolyte of Pharasma can target any number of objects.

attribs.name: repeating_cantrip_-NBm6gPRrafufvjm5RRu_description
attribs.current:
An acolyte of Pharasma focuses on the target object, opening their mind to perceive magical auras. When the casting is complete, the acolyte knows whether that item is magical, and if it is, they learn the school of magic.
If the object is illusory, the acolyte detects this only if the effect's level is lower than the level of their read aura spell.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NBm6hULnfPvRKi-71LM_description
attribs.current: As an acolyte of Pharasma cups their hands, water begins to flow forth from them. The acolyte creates 2 gallons of water. If no one drinks it, it evaporates after 1 day.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NBm6ifC5BaClXRpgEiQ_target
attribs.current: 1 Willing Living Creature or 1 Undead Creature

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NBm6ifC5BaClXRpgEiQ_heightened
attribs.current: Heightened (+1) The amount of healing or damage increases by 1d8, and the extra healing for the 2-action version increases by 8.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NBm6ifC5BaClXRpgEiQ_description
attribs.current:
An acolyte of Pharasma channels positive energy to heal the living or damage the undead. If the target is a willing living creature, the acolyte restores 1d8 Hit Points. If the target is undead, the acolyte deals that amount of positive damage to it, and it gets a basic Fortitude save. The number of actions the acolyte spend when Casting this Spell determines its targets, range, area, and other parameters.
[one-action] (somatic) The spell has a range of touch.
[two-actions] (somatic, verbal) The spell has a range of 30 feet. If the acolyte's healing a living creature, increase the Hit Points restored by 8.
[three-actions] (material, somatic, verbal) The acolyte disperses positive energy in a 30-foot emanation. This targets all living and undead creatures in the burst.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NBm6jnN6NK4Auu0ajYU_target
attribs.current: Non-Magical Object of Light Bulk or Less

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NBm6jnN6NK4Auu0ajYU_heightened
attribs.current:
Heightened (2nd) An acolyte of Pharasma can target a non-magical object of 1 Bulk or less.
Heightened (3rd) An acolyte of Pharasma can target a non-magical object of 2 Bulk or less, or a magical object of 1 Bulk or less.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NBm6jnN6NK4Auu0ajYU_description
attribs.current: An acolyte of Pharasma repairs the target item. The acolyte restores 5 Hit Points per spell level to the target, potentially removing the broken condition if this repairs it past the item's Broken Threshold. The acolyte can't replace lost pieces or repair an object that's been completely destroyed.

attribs.name: immunities
attribs.current: Death Effects, Disease, Paralyzed, Poison, Unconscious

attribs.name: repeating_free-actions-reactions_-NBmA6TYt3gUijZAMujB_description
attribs.current: Ibrique takes 20 damage for each hour she is exposed to sunlight.

attribs.name: repeating_actions-activities_-NBmAQccNuEWGgQAOauZ_description
attribs.current: DC 33, attack + 25; 7th sound burst; 6th modify memory, phantasmal killer, teleport; 5th dimension door; 4th confusion (3); 2nd darkness (at will); Cantrips (7th) daze, ghost sound, telekinetic projectile

attribs.name: repeating_actions-activities_-NBmAVIXj9tL2GJjXU60_description
attribs.current: Frequency once per round; Effect Ibrique focuses her gaze on a creature she can see within 30 feet. The target is dazzled for 1 round and must succeed at a DC 33 Will save or be confused for 1 round.

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NBmArj31Ie9Ii7W1lz9_description
attribs.current: Ibrique clouds the target's mind and daze it with a mental jolt. The jolt deals mental damage equal to Ibrique's charisma modifier; the target must attempt a basic Will save. If the target critically fails the save, it is also stunned 1.

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NBmAsrIk-v6jLuGFCzQ_heightened
attribs.current:
Heightened (3rd) The range increases to 60 feet.
Heightened (5th) The range increases to 120 feet.

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NBmAsrIk-v6jLuGFCzQ_description
attribs.current: Ibrique creates an auditory illusion of simple sounds that has a maximum volume equal to four normal humans shouting. The sounds emanate from a square Ibrique designates within range. Ibrique can't create intelligible words or other intricate sounds (such as music).

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NBmAu4ZZOiZgKg-6Gf8_description
attribs.current: Ibrique hurls a loose, unattended object that is within range and that has 1 Bulk or less at the target. Make a spell attack against the target. If Ibrique hits, she deals bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing damageas appropriate for the object she hurledequal to 1d6 plus her charisma modifier. No specific traits or magic properties of the hurled item affect the attack or the damage.

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NBmAvIPXFMibH-XHLLo_heightened
attribs.current: Heightened (4th) Even creatures with darkvision (but not greater darkvision) can barely see through the darkness. They treat targets seen through the darkness as concealed.

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NBmAvIPXFMibH-XHLLo_description
attribs.current: Ibrique creates a shroud of darkness that prevents light from penetrating or emanating within the area. Light does not enter the area and any non-magical light sources, such as a torch or lantern, do not emanate any light while inside the area, even if their light radius would extend beyond the darkness. This also suppresses magical light of Ibrique's darkness spell's level or lower. Light can't pass through, so creatures in the area can't see outside. From outside, it appears as a globe of pure darkness.

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NBmAx8ndJ4i-n4biwuY_heightened
attribs.current: Heightened (8th) Ibrique can target up to 10 creatures.

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NBmAx8ndJ4i-n4biwuY_description
attribs.current: Ibrique befuddles her target with strange impulses, causing it to act randomly. The effects are determined by the target's Will save. Ibrique can Dismiss the spell.

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NBmAx8ndJ4i-n4biwuY_save_failure
attribs.current: The target is confused for 1 minute. It can attempt a new save at the end of each of its turns to end the confusion.

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NBmAx8ndJ4i-n4biwuY_save_success
attribs.current: The target babbles incoherently and is stunned 1.

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NBmAx8ndJ4i-n4biwuY_save_critical_failure
attribs.current: The target is confused for 1 minute, with no save to end early.

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NBmAzp5fF2KhvS8XgST_heightened
attribs.current: Heightened (5th) The range increases to 1 mile. Ibrique doesn't need to be able to see her destination, as long as she has been there in the past and know its relative location and distance from her. Ibrique is temporarily immune for 1 hour.

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NBmAzp5fF2KhvS8XgST_description
attribs.current: Opening a door that bypasses normal space, Ibrique instantly transports herself and any items she's wearing and holding from her current space to a clear space within range she can see. If this would bring another creature with Ibriqueeven if she's carrying it in an extradimensional containerthe spell is lost.

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NBmB1EbhQgPMFSBcMuV_heightened
attribs.current: Heightened (6th) Ibrique can cast the spell on a willing target to suppress all memory of a particular topic, detailed in 50 words or fewer. The effect is permanent, and it patches these omissions with an indistinct haze.

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NBmB1EbhQgPMFSBcMuV_description
attribs.current:
Ibrique alters the target's memories, either erasing a memory, enhancing a memory's clarity, altering a memory, or adding a false memory. The target can attempt a Will save to resist the spell.
Any memories Ibrique's altered remain changed as long as the spell is active. If the target moves out of range before the 5 minutes is up, Ibrique can't alter any further memories.

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NBmB1EbhQgPMFSBcMuV_save_failure
attribs.current: During the first 5 minutes of the spell's duration, Ibrique can Sustain the Spell to modify a memory once each round. When Ibrique does, she imagines up to 6 seconds of memory to modify, to a maximum of 5 continuous minutes of memory.

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NBmB1EbhQgPMFSBcMuV_save_success
attribs.current: The target is unaffected but thinks Ibrique's spell was something harmless instead of modify memory, unless it identifies the spell.

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NBmB1EbhQgPMFSBcMuV_save_critical_success
attribs.current: The target is unaffected and realizes Ibrique tried to alter its memory.

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NBmB2cWdaBhX4EhDv-F_heightened
attribs.current: Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 2d6 on a failure and by 3d6 on a critical failure.

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NBmB2cWdaBhX4EhDv-F_description
attribs.current: Ibrique creates a phantasmal image of the most fearsome creature imaginable to the target. Only the spell's target can see the killer, though Ibrique can see the vague shape of the illusion as it races forth to attack. The effect of the killer is based on the outcome of the target's Will save.

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NBmB2cWdaBhX4EhDv-F_save_failure
attribs.current: The target takes 8d6 mental damage and is frightened 2.

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NBmB2cWdaBhX4EhDv-F_save_success
attribs.current: The target takes 4d6 mental damage and is frightened 1.

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NBmB2cWdaBhX4EhDv-F_save_critical_failure
attribs.current: The target is so afraid it might die. It must attempt a Fortitude save; if the target fails, it dies. On a successful Fortitude save, the target takes 12d6 mental damage, is fleeing until the end of its next turn, and is frightened 4. This effect has the incapacitation trait.

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NBmB3fMPLIFZwCb9wVD_target
attribs.current: Ibrique and Up to 4 Targets Touched, Either Willing Creatures or Objects Roughly the Size of a Creature

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NBmB3fMPLIFZwCb9wVD_heightened
attribs.current:
Heightened (7th) Ibrique and the other targets can travel to any location within 1,000 miles.
Heightened (8th) Ibrique and the other targets can travel to any location on the same planet. If Ibrique travel more than 1,000 miles, she arrives only 10 miles off target.
Heightened (9th) Ibrique and the other targets can travel to any location on another planet within the same solar system. Assuming Ibrique has accurate knowledge of the location's position and appearance, you arrive on the new planet 100 miles off target.
Heightened (10th) As the 9th-level version, but Ibrique and the other targets can travel to any planet within the same galaxy.

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NBmB3fMPLIFZwCb9wVD_description
attribs.current: Ibrique and the targets are instantly transported to any location within range, as long as she can identify the location precisely both by its position relative to her starting position and by its appearance (or other identifying features). Incorrect knowledge of the location's appearance usually causes the spell to fail, but it could instead lead to teleporting to an unwanted location or some other unusual mishap determined by the GM. Teleport is not precise over great distances. The targets appear at a distance from the intended destination equal to roughly 1 percent of the total distance traveled, in a direction determined by the GM. For short journeys, this lack of precision is irrelevant, but for long distances this could be up to 1 mile.

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NBmB4gouLBA0haByES4_description
attribs.current: A cacophonous noise blasts out, dealing 2d10 sonic damage. Each creature must attempt a Fortitude save.

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NBmB4gouLBA0haByES4_save_failure
attribs.current: The creature takes full damage and is deafened for 1 round.

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NBmB4gouLBA0haByES4_save_critical_failure
attribs.current: The creature takes double damage, is deafened for 1 minute, and is stunned 1.

Due to their bizarre physical structures and ability to break down and feed on a wide variety of materials, oozes are able to adapt to nearly any climate, especially when assisted by magical or alchemical tinkering. As a result, explorers frequently encounter new and terrifying varieties of these amorphous creatures.

Carnivorous Blob
Carnivorous blobs are the ravenous spawn of shattered worlds far beyond the stars, born across the galaxy in inert form until they fall like meteorites onto unsuspecting worlds. These massive beings can lie dormant for years in desolate caverns or barren wastelands. When a carnivorous blob perceives living creatures nearby, it lurches to gelatinous life, seeking out and consuming every creature it can catch until it is destroyed or until it has been unable to locate food for 24 hours, at which point it returns to hibernation. Often, keeping food away from a carnivorous blob is the safest way to defeat it. The blobs ability to split into smaller oozes that might stay hidden after a fight means it can be hard to fully eradicate these mindless predators.

attribs.name: immunities
attribs.current: Acid, Critical Hits, Mental, Piercing, Precision, Slashing, Sonic, Unconscious, Visual

attribs.name: repeating_interaction-abilities_-NBIBIldjRxU44s1yZuR_description
attribs.current: A Ravenous Blood can sense nearby creatures through vibration and air or water movement.

attribs.name: repeating_interaction-abilities_-NBIBIldjRxU44s1yZuS_description
attribs.current: When a Ravenous Blood that has 10 or more HP is hit by an attack that would deal piercing or slashing damage, it splits into two identical oozes, each with half the originals HP. One Ravenous Blood is in the same space as the original, and the other is in an adjacent, unoccupied space. If no adjacent space is unoccupied, it automatically pushes creatures and objects out of the way to fill a space (the GM decides if an object or creature is too big or heavy to push).

attribs.name: repeating_free-actions-reactions_-NBIBIldjRxU44s1yZuT_trigger
attribs.current: The ravenous blood takes damage from any source.

attribs.name: repeating_free-actions-reactions_-NBIBIldjRxU44s1yZuT_description
attribs.current: Effect: The blob makes a pseudopod Strike against an adjacent target. If an adjacent creature dealt the triggering damage, that creature is the target of this Reactive Strike.

attribs.name: repeating_actions-activities_-NBIBIldjRxU44s1yZuV_description
attribs.current: A ravenous bloods acid damages only fleshnot bone, stone, wood, or other materialsbut is nonetheless devastating. Whenever a creature takes damage from this persistent bleed, it must succeed at a DC 35 Fortitude save or become drained 1 (drained 2 on a critical failure). On each subsequent failure, the drained condition value increases by 1 (or by 2 on a critical failure), to a maximum of drained 4.

attribs.name: repeating_actions-activities_-NBIBIldjRxU44s1yZuW_description
attribs.current:
[[2d12]] (2d12) bludgeoning plus [[2d6]] (2d6) persistent bleed, DC 35. 
The monster deals the listed amount of damage to any numbers of creatures grabbed or restrained by it. Each of those creatures can attempt a basic Fortitude save with the listed DC.

attribs.name: repeating_actions-activities_-NBIBIldjRxU44s1yZuX_description
attribs.current:
DC 35, [[4d10]] (4d10) persistent bleed, Escape DC 35, Rupture 20.  
The monster Strides up to double its Speed and can move through the spaces of any creatures in its path. Any creature of the monsters size or smaller whose space the monster moves through can attempt a Reflex save with the listed DC to avoid being engulfed. A creature unable to act automatically critically fails this save. If a creature succeeds at its save, it can choose to be either pushed aside (out of the monsters path) or pushed in front of the monster to the end of the monsters movement. The monster can attempt to Engulf the same creature only once in a single use of Engulf. The monster can contain as many creatures as can fit in its space. A creature that fails its save is pulled into the monsters body. It is grabbed, is slowed 1, and has to hold its breath or start suffocating. The creature takes the listed amount of damage when first engulfed and at the end of each of its turns while its engulfed. An engulfed creature can get free by Escaping against the listed escape DC. An engulfed creature can attack the monster engulfing it, but only with unarmed attacks or with weapons of light Bulk or less. The engulfing creature is flat-footed against the attack. If the monster takes piercing or slashing damage equaling or exceeding the listed Rupture value from a single attack or spell, the engulfed creature cuts itself free. A creature that gets free by either method can immediately breathe and exits the swallowing monsters space. If the monster dies, all creatures it has engulfed are automatically released as the monsters form loses cohesion.

attribs.name: npc_short_description
attribs.current: All six sides of this adamantine-reinforced box are covered with Thassilonian runes. Touching a rune allows one to exchange its position with another.

attribs.name: immunities
attribs.current: Critical Hits, Object Immunities, Precision Damage

attribs.name: repeating_interaction-abilities_-NBmdvrsfFUzO8r3aUj9_description
attribs.current: Thievery DC 41 (expert) to feel the subtle vibrations when moving a rune to shift into the right position, or Thassilon Lore DC 33 (expert) or Society DC 38 (master) while being able to read Thassilonian to work out the anagram puzzle using traditional means, or dispel magic (7th level; counteract DC 34)

attribs.name: repeating_free-actions-reactions_-NBme-TctAhtzCboZQpx_trigger
attribs.current: The paradox engine is damaged, or a creature fails a check to disable it;

attribs.name: repeating_free-actions-reactions_-NBme-TctAhtzCboZQpx_description
attribs.current: Effect Slats on the sides of the box open to release beams of razor-sharp freezing darkness that swipe throughout area C5 and extend 10 feet south into area C4; all creatures in this area who lack the Shadow trait take [[5d6]] (5d6) slashing damage and [[5d6]] (5d6) cold damage (DC 34 basic Reflex save).

attribs.name: repeating_actions-activities_-NBmeADtqV2Wrk8-alZR_description
attribs.current: The slicing shadows congeal into the form of what appears to be the upper half of a skeletal, cowled humanoid: an owb prophet (Pathfinder Bestiary 3 197). This owb prophet is a creation of the paradox engine and does not have a forsaken patron. While the owb prophet is active, the paradox engine no longer uses its Slicing Shadows reaction; instead, the owb prophet focuses its attacks on creatures that attempt to damage or deactivate the engine. If the owb prophet is destroyed, the paradox engines disable DCs and Hardness are reduced by 5. It thereafter functions as a simple hazard with the Slicing Shadows reaction, and resets after 1 round.

attribs.name: repeating_actions-activities_-NBmeEr0HlolWO7v2RQ2_description
attribs.current: The paradox engine deactivates 1 minute, and its owb prophet returns to its interior after all creatures leave the area, but resets immediately thereafter.

{"size":"Small","Token":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/files.d20.io/images/206446598/e2UkmghoA75zTsSgXIM7jw/original.png","level":"13","speed":"25","arcana":"27","senses":"darkvision, true seeing","traits":"Rare, Construct","stealth":"25","Category":"Monsters","npc_type":"Creature","spell_dc":"35","Expansion":"9361","alignment":"LN","data-List":"false","deception":"24","languages":"truescript","immunities":"death effects, disease, doomed, drained, fatigued, healing, necromancy, nonlethal, paralyzed, poison, sickened, unconscious","perception":"25","armor_class":"34","description":"Living Symbol
Magic is a complex thing to begin with, and at a certain level of sophistication, the differences between a spell and an autonomous creature become increasingly blurry. Living symbols are constructed creatures of reified and reinforced magic, held together by glyphs, runes, and eldritch formulae.

The most famous living runes are those of the ancient Runelords of Thassilon, resurging as Thassilon rebuilds in the modern era. Other living runes can be found, however, each with its own particular abilities. Living runes can also be crafted to deal different types of energy damage with their Strikes.
Divine: Divine living runes are crafted by various churches and sects and typically bear the symbol of a deity, archdevil, or other divine force. Divine living runes replace Arcana with Religion and have the following innate spells.
Divine Innate Spells DC 35, attack +27; 7th divine decree (2); 6th blade barrier, glyph of warding (at will), repulsion, spirit blast; 5th divine wrath (2), flame strike
Occult: These runes are crafted by unknown hands and often left in out-of-the-way places. Occult living runes replace Arcana with Occultism and have the following innate spells.
Occult Innate Spells DC 35, attack +27; 7th visions of danger (2); 6th feeblemind, glyph of warding (at will), phantasmal calamity, vibrant pattern; 5th crushing despair (2), synesthesia (2); Cantrips (7th) detect magic; Constant (6th) true seeing
Primal: Primal living runes usually resemble animate carvings rather than lines of power or paint, and are often found on menhirs or sacred trees. Primal living runes replace Arcana with Nature and have the following innate spells.
Primal Innate Spells DC 35, attack +27; 7th volcanic eruption (2); 6th baleful polymorph, flesh to stone, glyph of warding (at will), tangling creepers; 5th cone of cold (2), wall of fire (2); 1st detect alignment (at will); Constant (6th) true seeing
Camouflage
Living runes are aware of the value of surprise attacks. They often hide themselves amongst other inscriptions or glyphs, observing foes for a time before striking, though clever adventurers who Investigate the inscriptions might notice the presence of the living rune. attribs.name: stealth_notes

attribs.name: immunities

attribs.name: repeating_interaction-abilities_-NBIBhZF7999qzpFfEAo_description
attribs.current: When a creature attempts to Strike a living rune and critically misses, the attacker hits the surface (a canvas, wall, or so on) behind the living rune. This might damage the surface or the attackers weapon, at the GMs discretion.

attribs.name: repeating_interaction-abilities_-NBIBhZF7999qzpFfEAp_description
attribs.current: A living rune can move only along flat surfaces. If the surface its on is destroyed (such as a rune hit by a fireball spell or a wall being smashed), the rune takes [[7d6]] (7d6) damage and is shunted to the nearest flat surface. If there is no flat surface within 5 feet, the rune is destroyed.

attribs.name: repeating_interaction-abilities_-NBIBhZF7999qzpFfEAq_description
attribs.current: A living rune cant speak, but it can sculpt its form into complicated scripts and pictographs that can be understood by any creature with the ability to read written language. A living rune can also understand any written or spoken language.

attribs.name: repeating_actions-activities_-NBIBhZF7999qzpFfEAs_description
attribs.current: DC 35, attack +27; 7th prismatic spray (2); 6th chain lightning, disintegrate, glyph of warding (at will), wall of force; 5th black tentacles (2), cloudkill (2); Cantrips (7th) detect magic; Constant (6th) true seeing

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NBIBhZF7999qzpFfEAt_description
attribs.current:
A spray of rainbow light beams cascades from a living rune's open hand. Each creature in the area must roll 1d8 on the table below to see which beam affects it, then attempt a saving throw of the indicated type. The table notes any additional traits that apply to each type of ray. If a creature is struck by multiple beams, it uses the same d20 result for all its saving throws. For all rays, a successful saving throw negates the effect for that creature.
1d8        Colour        Save        Effect (Traits)
1        Red        Reflex        50 fire damage (fire)
2        Orange        Reflex        60 acid damage (acid)
3        Yellow        Reflex        70 electricity damage (electricity)
4        Green        Fort        30 poison damage and enfeebled 1 for 1 minute        (poison)
5        Blue        Fort        Affected as if by flesh to stone
6        Indigo        Will        Confused, as the warp mind spell (mental)
7        Violet        Will        Slowed 1 for 1 minute; if a critical failure, sent to         another plane, as plane shift (teleportation)
8        Potent                Affected by two beamsroll beam twice, rerolling any duplicates        or results of 8

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NBIBhZGcVyWwMsSsGI5_description
attribs.current: A living rune discharges a powerful bolt of lightning at the target, dealing 8d12 electricity damage. The target must attempt a basic Reflex save. The electricity arcs to another creature within 30 feet of the first target, jumps to another creature within 30 feet of that target, and so on. The living rune can end the chain at any point. The living rune can 't target the same creature more than once, and you must have line of effect to all targets. Roll the damage only once, and apply it to each target (halving or doubling as appropriate for its saving throw outcome). The chain ends if any one of the targets critically succeeds at its save.

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NBIBhZGcVyWwMsSsGI6_description
attribs.current:
A living rune fires a green ray at your target. Make a spell attack. The living rune deals 12d10 damage, and the target must attempt a basic Fortitude save. On a critical hit, treat the save result as one degree worse. A creature reduced to 0 HP is reduced to fine powder; its gear remains.
An object the living rune hit is destroyed (no save), regardless of Hardness, unless it's an artefact or similarly hard to destroy. A single casting can destroy no more than a 10-foot cube of matter. This automatically destroys any force construct, such as a wall of force.

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NBIBhZGcVyWwMsSsGI7_description
attribs.current:
A living rune crafts a trap by binding a hostile spell into a symbol. While Casting this Spell, the living rune also Cast a Spell of a lower spell level to store in the glyph. The stored spell must take 3 actions or fewer to cast, have a hostile effect, and target one creature or have an area. The living rune can set a password, a trigger, or both for the glyph. Any creature that moves, opens, or touches the target container or enters the target area that doesn't speak the password or that matches the trigger activates the glyph, releasing the harmful spell within. 
Once a spell is stored in the glyph, the glyph gains all the traits of that spell. If the stored spell targets one or more creatures, it targets the creature that set off the glyph. If it has an area, that area is centered on the creature that set off the glyph. Glyph of warding's duration ends when the glyph is triggered. The glyph counts as a magical trap, using your spell DC for both the Perception check to notice it and the Thievery check to disable it; both checks require the creature attempting them to be trained in order to succeed.
The living rune can Dismiss glyph of warding. The maximum number of glyphs of warding the living rune can have active at a time is equal to its charisma modifier.

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NBIBhZGcVyWwMsSsGI8_description
attribs.current:
A living rune forms an invisible wall of pure magical force up to 50 feet long and up to 20 feet high. The wall has no discernible thickness. The living rune must create the wall in an unbroken open space so its edges don't pass through any creatures or objects, or the spell is lost. The wall has AC 10, Hardness 30, and 60 Hit Points, and it's immune to critical hits and precision damage. The wall blocks physical effects from passing through it, and because it's made of force, it blocks incorporeal and ethereal creatures as well. Teleportation effects can pass through the barrier, as can visual effects (since the wall is invisible).
Wall of force is immune to counteracting effects of its level or lower, but the wall is automatically destroyed by a disintegrate spell of any level or by contact with a rod of cancellation or sphere of annihilation.

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NBIBhZGcVyWwMsSsGI9_description
attribs.current: Oily black tentacles rise up and attempt to capture each creature in the area. Make spell attack rolls against the Fortitude DC of each creature. Any creature a living rune succeeds against is grabbed by a tentacle and takes 3d6 bludgeoning damage. Whenever a creature ends its turn in the area, the tentacles attempt to grab that creature if they haven't already, and they deal 1d6 bludgeoning damage to any creature already grabbed. The tentacles ' Escape DC is equal to the living rune's spell DC. A creature can attack a tentacle in an attempt to release its grip. Its AC is equal to the living rune's spell DC, and it is destroyed if it takes 12 or more damage. Even if destroyed, additional tentacles continue to grow in the area until the duration ends. The living rune can Dismiss the spell.

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NBIBhZGcVyWwMsSsGIA_description
attribs.current: A living rune conjures a poisonous fog. This functions as obscuring mist, except the area moves 10 feet away from the living rune each round. The living rune deals 6d8 poison damage to each breathing creature that starts its turn in the spell's area. The living rune can Dismiss the spell.

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NBIBhZGcVyWwMsSsGIB_description
attribs.current: A living rune sees things within 60 feet as they actually are. The GM rolls a secret counteract check against any illusion or transmutation in the area, but only for the purpose of determining whether the living rune see through it (for instance, if the check succeeds against a polymorph spell, the living rune can see the creature's true form, but it doesn't end the polymorph spell).

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NBIBhZGcVyWwMsSsGI5_target
attribs.current: 1 Creature, Plus Any Number of Additional Creatures

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NBIBhZGcVyWwMsSsGI8_heightened
attribs.current: Heightened (+2) The Hit Points of the wall increases by 20.

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NBIBhZGcVyWwMsSsGI9_area
attribs.current: 20-foot Burst Adjacent to a Flat Surface

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NBqZ69qbk-k15GJl1Az_heightened
attribs.current:
Heightened (3rd) A living rune learns the school of magic for the highest-level effect within range that the spell detects. If multiple effects are equally strong, the GM determines which the living rune learns.
Heightened (4th) As 3rd level, but a living rune also pinpoints the source of the highest-level magic. Like for an imprecise sense, the living rune doesn't learn the exact location, but can narrow down the source to within a 5-foot cube (or the nearest if larger than that).

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NBqZ69qbk-k15GJl1Az_description
attribs.current:
A living rune sends out a pulse that registers the presence of magic. The living rune receives no information beyond the presence or absence of magic. The living rune can choose to ignore magic it's fully aware of, such as the magic items and ongoing spells of it and its allies.
The living rune detects illusion magic only if that magic's effect has a lower level than the level of its detect magic spell. However, items that have an illusion aura but aren't deceptive in appearance (such as an invisibility potion) typically are detected normally.

attribs.name: repeating_spellfocus_-NBqeABNepQR6ye3GG2P_description
attribs.current: Aliriel fires a ray of sickening energy. Make a spell attack roll.

attribs.name: repeating_spellfocus_-NBqeABNepQR6ye3GG2P_save_critical_success

attribs.name: repeating_spellfocus_-NBqeBVucRkEqMYoh-P2_description
attribs.current:
Huge amounts of food and drink fill the target. It receives a full meal's worth of nourishment and must attempt a Fortitude save.
A target sickened by this spell takes a 10-foot status penalty to its Speed until it's no longer sickened.

attribs.name: repeating_spellfocus_-NBqeBVucRkEqMYoh-P2_save_success
attribs.current: The target is sickened 1, but if it spends an action to end the condition, it succeeds automatically.

attribs.name: repeating_spellfocus_-NBqeCsqS-dpX4ZJmumf_heightened
attribs.current: Heightened (7th) Aliriel can attempt to progress any number of the target's eligible afflictions and persistent poison damage.

attribs.name: repeating_spellfocus_-NBqeCsqS-dpX4ZJmumf_description
attribs.current:
When someone has overindulged, Aliriel can hasten them past the worst of their affliction or intensify their misery. This spell attempts to progress a disease affliction, a poison affliction, or persistent poison damage affecting the target. If the target is affected by more than one of these, Aliriel can choose from among those she is aware of; otherwise the GM chooses randomly. An unwilling target can attempt a Will save to negate take its course.
The effect of this spell depends on whether Aliriel's attempting to end an affliction or persistent poison damage, and whether she is attempting to help or hinder the target's recovery.
 Affliction The target immediately attempts its next saving throw against the affliction. Aliriel can grant the creature your choice of a +2 status bonus or a 2 status penalty to its saving throw against the affliction.
 Persistent Poison Aliriel can cause the target take the persistent poison damage immediately when she Cast this Spell (in addition to taking it at the end of its next turn). Whether or not Aliriel do so, the target attempts an additional flat check against the persistent poison damage. Aliriel can set the DC of that flat check to 5 or 20 instead of the normal DC.

attribs.name: repeating_cantrip_-NBqeETJ5sCP0HHZUVSU_heightened
attribs.current: Heightened (+1) The negative damage to living creatures increases by 1d4.

attribs.name: repeating_cantrip_-NBqeETJ5sCP0HHZUVSU_description
attribs.current:
Siphoning negative energy into herself, Aliriel's hand radiates a pale darkness. Aliriel's touch weakens the living and disorients undead, possibly even causing them to flee. The effect depends on whether the target is living or undead.
 Living Creature The spell deals negative damage equal to 1d4 plus Aliriel's intelligence modifier. The target attempts a basic Fortitude save, but is also enfeebled 1 for 1 round on a critical failure.
 Undead Creature The target is flat-footed for 1 round on a failed Fortitude save. On a critical failure, the target is also fleeing for 1 round unless it succeeds at a Will save.

attribs.name: repeating_cantrip_-NBqeFvS4rhNNOj0DGIt_heightened
attribs.current:
Heightened (3rd) Aliriel learns the school of magic for the highest-level effect within range that the spell detects. If multiple effects are equally strong, the GM determines which Aliriel learns.
Heightened (4th) As 3rd level, but Aliriel also pinpoints the source of the highest-level magic. Like for an imprecise sense, Aliriel doesn't learn the exact location, but can narrow down the source to within a 5-foot cube (or the nearest if larger than that).

attribs.name: repeating_cantrip_-NBqeFvS4rhNNOj0DGIt_description
attribs.current:
Aliriel sends out a pulse that registers the presence of magic. Aliriel receives no information beyond the presence or absence of magic. Aliriel can choose to ignore magic she's fully aware of, such as the magic items and ongoing spells of her and her allies.
Aliriel detects illusion magic only if that magic's effect has a lower level than the level of her detect magic spell. However, items that have an illusion aura but aren't deceptive in appearance (such as an invisibility potion) typically are detected normally.

attribs.name: repeating_cantrip_-NBqeHH3DIT0YZ8ifiQQ_description
attribs.current: An arc of lightning leaps from one target to another. Aliriel deals electricity damage equal to 1d4 plus her intelligence modifier.

attribs.name: repeating_cantrip_-NBqeIDdr7t5jpqEWC6B_target
attribs.current: 1 Unattended Object of 2 Bulk or Less

attribs.name: repeating_cantrip_-NBqeIDdr7t5jpqEWC6B_heightened
attribs.current:
Heightened (3rd) Aliriel can target an unattended object with a Bulk of 1 or less.
Heightened (5th) The range increases to 60 feet, and Aliriel can target an unattended object with a Bulk of 1 or less.
Heightened (7th) The range increases to 60 feet, and Aliriel can target an unattended object with a Bulk of 2 or less.

attribs.name: repeating_cantrip_-NBqeIDdr7t5jpqEWC6B_description
attribs.current: Aliriel creates a single magical hand, either invisible or ghostlike, that grasps the target object and moves it slowly up to 20 feet. Because Aliriel's levitating the object, she can move it in any direction. When Aliriel Sustain the Spell, she can move the object an additional 20 feet. If the object is in the air when the spell ends, the object falls.

attribs.name: repeating_cantrip_-NBqeJQzTAR1aeQDe7yp_description
attribs.current:
The simplest magic does Aliriel's bidding. Aliriel can perform simple magical effects for as long as she Sustain the Spell. Each time Aliriel Sustain the Spell, she can choose one of four options.
 Cook Cool, warm, or flavour 1 pound of nonliving material.
 Lift Slowly lift an unattended object of light Bulk or less 1 foot off the ground.
 Make Create a temporary object of negligible Bulk, made of congealed magical substance. The object looks crude and artificial and is extremely fragileit can't be used as a tool, weapon, or spell component.
 Tidy Colour, clean, or soil an object of light Bulk or less. Aliriel can affect an object of 1 Bulk with 10 rounds of concentration, and a larger object a 1 minute per Bulk.
Prestidigitation can't deal damage or cause adverse conditions. Any actual change to an object (beyond what is noted above) persists only as long as Aliriel Sustain the Spell.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NBqeLV9i--kYtC3gVic_description
attribs.current: A ray with the power to sap a foe's strength flashes from Aliriel's hand. Attempt a ranged spell attack against the target. If Aliriel succeeds, that creature attempts a Fortitude save in order to determine the spell's effect. If Aliriel critically succeeds on her attack roll, use the outcome for one degree of success worse than the result of its save.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NBqeNCW9Sm1jUKbjehd_duration
attribs.current: Until the End of Aliriel's Turn

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NBqeNCW9Sm1jUKbjehd_description
attribs.current: A glimpse into the future ensures Aliriel's next blow strikes true. The next time Aliriel makes an attack roll before the end of her turn, roll the attack twice and use the better result. The attack ignores circumstance penalties to the attack roll and any flat check required due to the target being concealed or hidden.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NBqePCfQ9JIztaJ4lAM_description
attribs.current: The target loses hearing; it must attempt a Fortitude save. The target is then temporarily immune for 1 minute.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NBqePCfQ9JIztaJ4lAM_save_failure
attribs.current: The target is deafened for 10 minutes.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NBqePCfQ9JIztaJ4lAM_save_success
attribs.current: The target is deafened for 1 round.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NBqeRa7OKp0uFPadx9U_description
attribs.current:
Three illusory images of Aliriel swirl abouts her space, potentially causing those who attack her to hit one of the images instead of her. Any attack that would hit Aliriel has a random chance of hitting one of her images instead of her . If all three images remain, there is a 1 in 4 chance of hitting Aliriel (1 on 1d4). With two images remaining, there is a 1 in 3 chance of hitting you (12 on 1d6). With only one image, the chances are 1 in 2 (13 on 1d6).
Once an image is hit, it is destroyed. If an attack roll fails to hit Aliriel's AC but doesn't critically fail, it destroys an image but has no additional effect (even if the attack would normally have an effect on a failure). If an attack roll is a critical success and would hit one of the images, one of the images is destroyed and the attack roll becomes a success against Aliriel. Once all the images are destroyed, the spell ends.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NBqeTH0fcNvlhnVZFuP_description
attribs.current: Aliriel creates a semicorporeal hand out of her essence that delivers touch spells for her. Whenever Aliriel Cast a Spell with a range of touch, she can have the hand crawl to a target within range along the ground, touch it, and then crawl back to her. When making a melee spell attack with the hand, Aliriel use her normal bonuses. The hand can move as far as it needs to within range. The hand has Aliriel's AC and saves, but any damage to the hand destroys it and causes her to take 1d6 damage.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NBqeVf45KYnX3zt1Bvd_description
attribs.current: Aliriel blinds the target. The effect is determined by the target 's Fortitude save. The target then becomes temporarily immune for 1 minute.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NBqeVf45KYnX3zt1Bvd_save_failure
attribs.current: The target is blinded for 1 minute.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NBqeVf45KYnX3zt1Bvd_save_success
attribs.current: The target is blinded until its next turn begins.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NBqeXIxeqEVVltUp7hf_duration
attribs.current: 1 Round or Sustained Up to 1 Minute

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NBqeXIxeqEVVltUp7hf_description
attribs.current: With a cursory mental touch, Aliriel attempts to read the target's mind. It must attempt a Will save. The target then becomes temporarily immune to your mind reading for 1 hour.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NBqeXIxeqEVVltUp7hf_save_failure
attribs.current: Aliriel perceives vague surface thoughts from the target when she Cast the Spell, and she finds out whether its Intelligence modifier is higher than, equal to, or lower than hers.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NBqeXIxeqEVVltUp7hf_save_success
attribs.current: Aliriel finds out whether the target's Intelligence modifier is higher than, equal to, or lower than hers.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NBqeXIxeqEVVltUp7hf_save_critical_failure
attribs.current: As failure, and for the duration of the spell, Aliriel can Sustain the Spell to detect the target's surface thoughts again. The target doesn't receive any additional saves.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NBqeXIxeqEVVltUp7hf_save_critical_success
attribs.current: The target perceives vague surface thoughts from Aliriel when you Cast the Spell.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NBqeY9DQVjb4b7nfbpn_heightened
attribs.current: Heightened (6th) Aliriel can target up to 10 creatures.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NBqeY9DQVjb4b7nfbpn_description
attribs.current: Aliriel dilates the flow of time around the target, slowing its actions.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NBqeY9DQVjb4b7nfbpn_save_failure
attribs.current: The target is slowed 1 for 1 minute.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NBqeY9DQVjb4b7nfbpn_save_success
attribs.current: The target is slowed 1 for 1 round.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NBqeY9DQVjb4b7nfbpn_save_critical_failure
attribs.current: The target is slowed 2 for 1 minute.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NBqeZxTWZHcOE-r8EHB_heightened
attribs.current: Heightened (5th) The range increases to 1 mile. Aliriel doesn't need to be able to see her destination, as long as she has been there in the past and know its relative location and distance from her. Aliriel is temporarily immune for 1 hour.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NBqeZxTWZHcOE-r8EHB_description
attribs.current: Opening a door that bypasses normal space, Aliriel instantly transports herself and any items she's wearing and holding from her current space to a clear space within range she can see. If this would bring another creature with Alirieleven if she's carrying it in an extradimensional containerthe spell is lost.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NBqeaN78JL-aLDiHiMe_heightened
attribs.current: Heightened (+1) The negative damage increases by 2d4, and the persistent bleed damage increases by 1.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NBqeaN78JL-aLDiHiMe_description
attribs.current: Tendrils of darkness curl out from Aliriel's fingertips and race through the air. Aliriel deals 2d4 negative damage and 1 persistent bleed damage to living creatures in the line. Each living creature in the line must attempt a Fortitude save.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NBqeaN78JL-aLDiHiMe_save_success
attribs.current: The creature takes half the negative damage and no persistent bleed damage.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NBqeaN78JL-aLDiHiMe_save_critical_failure
attribs.current: The creature takes double negative damage and double persistent bleed damage.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NBqebU9KLFYtj9dgZZQ_description
attribs.current: Aliriel sends disturbing nightmares to her target. The next time the target falls asleep, it must attempt a Will save. If Aliriel knows the target only by name and have never met them, the target gets a +4 circumstance bonus to the Will save.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NBqebU9KLFYtj9dgZZQ_save_failure
attribs.current: The target experiences the nightmares and awakens fatigued.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NBqebU9KLFYtj9dgZZQ_save_success

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NBqebU9KLFYtj9dgZZQ_save_critical_failure
attribs.current: The target experiences the nightmares, awakens fatigued, and is drained 2 until it is no longer fatigued.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NBqebU9KLFYtj9dgZZQ_save_critical_success
attribs.current: The target suffers no adverse effects and is temporarily immune for 1 week.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NBqedWrFkUxLG0Pq9iM_description
attribs.current: Aliriel conjures a poisonous fog. This functions as obscuring mist, except the area moves 10 feet away from Aliriel each round. Aliriel deals 6d8 poison damage to each breathing creature that starts its turn in the spell's area. Aliriel can Dismiss the spell.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NBqeeUVpb5-Pmp-kzYs_description
attribs.current: Aliriel casts her thoughts through a creature's mind, sifting for information. Aliriel accesses the target's memories and knowledge unless it fends you off with a Will save.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NBqeeUVpb5-Pmp-kzYs_save_failure
attribs.current: Each round of the spell's duration, Aliriel can Sustain the Spell to ask a different question and attempt to uncover the answer. For each question, the target can attempt a Deception check against Aliriel's spell DC; if the target succeeds, Aliriel doesn't learn the answer, and on a critical success, the target gives her a false answer that she believes is truthful Once she's asked the target a given question, asking it again, even with a separate casting of mind probe, produces the same result.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NBqeeUVpb5-Pmp-kzYs_save_critical_failure

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NBqegOsPMvnjm5ZaYMp_description
attribs.current: Aliriel accessesthe Shadow Plane, using its warped nature to spread her travels. The targets enter the edge of the Shadow Plane where it borders the Material Plane. Targets can't see the Material Plane while on the Shadow Plane (although elements of that plane can sometimes be a hazy reflection of the Material Plane). While on the Shadow Plane, the targets are exposed to potential encounters with that plane's denizens. The shadows on the border between the planes bend space, speeding up Aliriel's movement with respect to the Material Plane. Every 3 minutes the targets travel along this border, they move as far as they would through the Material Plane in 1 hour. At any point, a target can Dismiss the spell's effects, although this affects only that target. The shadow bending is inexact, so when the spell ends, the targets appear roughly 1 mile from their intended location on the Material Plane (though those who are traveling together and Dismiss the spell at the same point on the Plane of Shadow appear together).

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NBqeiSu-XNPruCF3hOG_description
attribs.current: Aliriel transforms the target creature into a harmless animal appropriate to the area, with effects based on its Fortitude save.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NBqeiSu-XNPruCF3hOG_save_failure
attribs.current: The target transforms for 1 minute but keeps itsmind. If it spends all its actions on its turn concentrating on its original form, it can attempt a Will save to end the effectimmediately.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NBqeiSu-XNPruCF3hOG_save_success
attribs.current: The targets body gains minor features of the harmless animal. Its insides churn as they partially transform, causing it to be sickened 1. When it recovers from the sickened condition, its features revert to normal.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NBqeiSu-XNPruCF3hOG_save_critical_failure
attribs.current: The target is transformed into the chosen harmless animal, body and mind, for an unlimited duration.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NBqejfScl503ShbKhYh_description
attribs.current:
Aliriel draws in the blood and life force of other creatures through her outstretched arms. Aliriel deals 12d6 negative damage to living creatures in the area. 
Aliriel gains temporary Hit Points equal to half the damage a single creature takes from this spell; calculate these temporary Hit Points using the creature that took the most damage. Aliriel loses any remaining temporary Hit Points after 1 minute.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NBqelHWzmeSahOrkdTb_heightened
attribs.current: Heightened (+2) The Hit Points of the wall increases by 20.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NBqelHWzmeSahOrkdTb_description
attribs.current:
Aliriel forms an invisible wall of pure magical force up to 50 feet long and up to 20 feet high. The wall has no discernible thickness. Aliriel must create the wall in an unbroken open space so its edges don't pass through any creatures or objects, or the spell is lost. The wall has AC 10, Hardness 30, and 60 Hit Points, and it's immune to critical hits and precision damage. The wall blocks physical effects from passing through it, and because it's made of force, it blocks incorporeal and ethereal creatures as well. Teleportation effects can pass through the barrier, as can visual effects (since the wall is invisible).
Wall of force is immune to counteracting effects of its level or lower, but the wall is automatically destroyed by a disintegrate spell of any level or by contact with a rod of cancellation or sphere of annihilation.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NBqenSrZhNiApzFNnzS_target
attribs.current: 1 Spell Effect or Unattended Magic Item

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NBqenSrZhNiApzFNnzS_description
attribs.current: Aliriel unravels the magic behind a spell or effect. Attempt a counteract check against the target. Counteracting a Magic Item causes it to become mundane for 10 minutes. This doesn't change the item's non-magical properties. If the target is an artefact or similar item, Aliriel automatically fails.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NBqep8PvnMlLZTd-xxo_heightened
attribs.current: Heightened (+1) The cold damage increases by 1d10 and the negative damage against the living increases by 1d4.

attribs.current:
A globe of freezing darkness explodes in the area, dealing 8d10 cold damage to creatures in the area, plus 8d4 additional negative damage to living creatures. Creatures in the area must attempt a Reflex save. 
If the globe overlaps with an area of magical light or affects a creature affected by magical light, eclipse burst attempts to counteract the light effect.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NBqeqLYfOWtyZi2DDPi_description
attribs.current: Aliriel sends a dart of force streaking toward a creature that she can see. It automatically hits and deals 1d4+1 force damage. For each additional action Aliriel uses when Casting the Spell, increase the number of missiles she shoots by one, to a maximum of three missiles for 3 actions. Aliriel chooses the target for each missile individually. If Aliriel shoots more than one missile at the same target, combine the damage before applying bonuses or penalties to damage, resistances, weaknesses, and so forth.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NBqerXY7J4SVJDvgOoR_description
attribs.current: Aliriel pulls the moisture from the targets' bodies, dealing 10d10 negative damage. Creatures made of water (such as water elementals) and plant creatures use the outcome for one degree of success worse than the result of their saving throw. Creatures whose bodies contain no significant moisture (such as earth elementals) are immune to horrid wilting.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NBqesSgbFGCLtgFxFbn_description
attribs.current:
Aliriel transports the target into an extradimensional maze of eldritch origin and trap it there. Once each turn, the target can spend 1 action to attempt a Survival check or Perception check against your spell DC to escape the maze.
Teleportation magic doesn't help the creature escape unless the magic can transport across planes, such as plane shift. When the spell ends, either because the target escaped or the duration ran out, the target returns to the space it occupied when it was banished, or to the nearest space if the original is now filled.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NBqesSgbFGCLtgFxFbn_save_failure
attribs.current: The target makes no progress toward escape.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NBqesSgbFGCLtgFxFbn_save_success
attribs.current: The target is on the right path to the exit. If the target was already on the right path, it escapes the maze and the spell ends.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NBqesSgbFGCLtgFxFbn_save_critical_failure
attribs.current: The target makes no progress toward escape, and if it was on the right path, it no longer is.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NBqesSgbFGCLtgFxFbn_save_critical_success
attribs.current: The target escapes and the spell ends.
